name: just a planet walking simulator
description:
It is recommended to play on full screen mode 

A simulator/unfinished game where you can travel between planets by a special vehicule. 

just go into that blue-colored thing (that is vehicule) and fly around planets.

right shift makes you run faster and jump higher. left shift makes you even faster!

Big thanks to the Sebastian Lague for turtorial about procedural planet making. All code of that turtorial is made by him (including the noise)

all physics by random dudes on internet me
